signature: <K, V> SortedMap<K, V> transformedSortedMap(final SortedMap<K, V> map, final Transformer<? super K, ? extends K> keyTransformer, final Transformer<? super V, ? extends V> valueTransformer)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before transforming sorted maps.
Transformers need to be initialized before they can be used in the transformation process.
The transformed map should be verified to ensure the transformation was successful.
Comparing the transformed map with the original can help in validating the transformation process.
